Open 3 portals to Zaun on random hexes in the second row. Any unit that starts combat in a portal gains 450 Health and 35% Attack Speed, and drops 1 gold on death.

Divinicorp Crown
Gain a Divinicorp Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Rhaast.
Dominance
For every 2 surviving champions after winning a player combat, gain 1 gold. Gain 16 XP.

Lifelong Learning
Your units gain 2% health every round. If they survive combat, they gain an additional 3 Ability Power and 3% Attack Damage.

Gain a Marskman Emblem, an Aphelios, and a Recurve Bow.
Marksman Crown

Pirates
Your units have a rare chance to drop treasure chests when they kill enemy champions.

Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Zeri, and a BF Sword.
Rapidfire Crown
Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Twisted Fate.
Share the Spotlight

Titanic Strength
Your team gains 1.25% of their max Health as Attack Damage and 1.25% of their max Health as Ability Power.
Unstable Evolution

Gargantuan Resolve
Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after 1 player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 50 instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by 80%.
